As a proud member of PCCA, GPS Pharmacy Solutions offers the highest quality ingredients and medications for the health of yourself, your family, and your pets! All of our compounding drugs are custom-made, precisely to your specific prescription. This means if you need a medication that isn't readily available on generic pharmacy shelves, we can create it for you!

Isn't it time you simplified the healthy lives of your pets, family members, and yourself? Our popular same-day medication delivery brings all of your prescription compounded drugs to your door, whether you live in Charlotte NC, Mint Hill, or another community in the surrounding areas.

Gone are the days of making appointments or searching for reliable or local pharmacy locations near you. Once you place your order online or over the phone, our staff will immediately begin to refill or prepare your medications. Expect to receive them at your door within the same day!

Wondering if we deliver to your current location? Reach out and we will be in touch shortly.

Explore Now

GPS Pharmacy in Charlotte NC Delivers Your Specialty Compounded Prescriptions Right to Your Door

Are you in need of custom compounding or palliative prescriptions? Need them quickly? GPS Pharmacy Solutions is the 24-hour pharmacy that specializes in same-day delivery of medications and prescriptions for the health of your loved ones and pets. We're currently serving Charlotte, Mint Hill, the surrounding North Carolina areas, and South Carolina, Illinois, Ohio, and Georgia.

Wondering if we deliver to your address? Before placing your order, call us at 980-245-2028 or contact us via email at gpspharmacyteam@gpsmymeds.com. Our team of pharmacists is standing by to assist you as a new customer and answer any questions you may have about our pharmacy solutions.

Our Professional Services

Whichever compounding needs you, your family, or pets may have, our pharmacy system has a concierge solution custom fit to you. We specialize in:

  • BHRT (Bio-identical Hormone Replacement Therapy)
  • Dermatologic Compounding
  • Veterinary Compounding
  • Pediatric Compounding
  • Ophthalmic Compounding
  • Hospice Compounding
  • Sterile Compounding (coming soon)
  • Wound Care
  • Sexual Health Compounding
  • Medication refills and much more!

To learn more about GPS Pharmacy Solutions, please call or contact us via email. Our experienced team is here to serve your health needs!

What Our Customers Have To Say

I have a special needs dog requiring three specially compounded medications. I was utilizing the vet recommended pharmacy and the prices skyrocketed for no apparent reason. I contacted GPS Pharmacy to see if they could help, and not only were they able to fill the prescriptions, but they were able to flavor them to my dog’s liking as well. What’s even better is they were half the costs of what I was paying. The staff’s professionalism and all around kindness blew me out of the water. I will be utilizing them for all of my family’s prescription needs from now on. Special shout out to Christina for being so easy to talk to about my furbaby’s needs and understanding the importance of making sure they get the care they need. I highly recommend them to anyone!

Leah Long

One of my dogs has 6 different medications that he takes. I have always used online pet pharmacy’s and Walgreens for his meds. Over a three year period that has added up and has always been a very stressful task. Not anymore. Every staff member I have spoken to over the past two days has gone above and beyond. Even to find lower prices and getting me my dogs medications in a timely manner. They offer delivery through them same day or through ups if you aren’t in a rush. I will never go anywhere else again for his medications. Thank you for everything you do for both your human and animal patients! 10/5!

Amber Kutlenios

I use GPS for all of my pet meds. The service is always quick and the employees are friendly and helpful.

My vet prescribed a liquid medication for my cat but the concentration was low so it would have been a lot of medication (2mL) to squirt into the cat’s mouth. The very kind pharmacist called me and said that she had talked to the vet about increasing the concentration so the amount of liquid would have been a lot less (0.5 mL) but still the same dosage. If you have ever had to give a cat an oral medication, you know how much this meant to me!!!! Any other pharmacy would have just filled the Rx as is but GPS took the time to take these extra steps.

I really appreciate this pharmacy because they look out for for my cat’s best interest. They also offer options to get a 3 month supply of the compounded medications (if prescribed) and that is a huge cost savings.

Ordering refills is easy and convenient and often delivered the same day. Thank you for always going out of your way to provide the best customer service. You are greatly appreciated!

Jodie Alexander

Extremely caring and responsive people. Fast, reliable service. I work with them on prescription medications to compound for our cat. Julia and Alex are top notch. I have talked with several staff members and they all keep each other informed on questions, take the time to research questions about compounding medications, respond thoroughly, and explain options in detail.

Irene King

STELLAR service, CARING employees, very attentive and grounded. I love that they work with their customers to be sure the scripts are never not on time and the patient is covered. Prices are more than fair, and competitive, with volume discounts. I have used a lot of compounding pharms, and these guys have been the Best. They know your name and your conditions. The Pharmacist will make personal calls for any questions. Just great.

Goldie Lamont

I am so grateful for the GPS Pharmacy in Matthews. My beloved cat needs a compounded medication. Since switching to GPS, Patton’s condition has improved. He is stable and enjoying life (at age 18 yr!).
I credit the pharmacist and quality of ingredients used for his successful treatment.
The service at GPS is outstanding. Qualified, friendly and GENUINE… a great combination. I’m impressed by Julya, Daniel and the rest of the staff.
I appreciate them so much!

Vickie S

Super friendly, quick, and reliable! Love y’all!

Happy Hypie

It’s a great service to have available. Your deliveries have been on time, and delivery personnel are very courteous. It is a pleasure doing business with GPS Pharmacy.

Carl Cornwell

We needed special medication for our dog and GPS Pharmacy was suggested by our vet. We have called in numerous times for refills, and every time the person answering the phone has been friendly, helpful, and efficient. The turnaround time is fast – typically 1-2 business days – and the delivery has been consistently reliable. We have been very happy with their service and highly recommend them.

Jennifer Boggs

Top Notch compounding pharmacy! I got familiar with them after a friend recommended them… my regular vet’s online pharmacy was failing to ship things quickly and then had a supply issue, so I switched to GPS and have never looked back. They also provided meds when my other little dog was needing special things. They are super kind, and even deliver in my area. What really got me, was when I had called to let them know my little dog had passed away and to stop the automatic refills, they had all signed a sweet sympathy card and delivered it with my next order for the other dog. This a a great bunch of folks!

Lynne Stevens

They have such amazing customer service, anytime they get a prescription from my doctor, I get a call within a few hours and the medication is delivered within about a day. They let you know when to expect the delivery and then text you once it’s delivered-I’ve had such great experiences with them!

GPS Pharmacy Charlotte NC, is a concierge compounding pharmacy with same-day medication delivery to patients located in North Carolina and South Carolina. We also offer free ground shipping to other states. GPS Pharmacy specializes in BHRT compounding, veterinary compounding, pediatric compounding, hospice compounding, wound care, and much more. Our state-of the-art USP <795>, USP <797>, and USP <800> compounding facilities are located in Charlotte, NC. GPS Pharmacy services hospital systems with 24-hour medication delivery.
